summary:
Parkour is an exciting physical activity where people, known as "traceurs," move through spaces quickly and creatively. It involves running, jumping, climbing, and flipping without using any special gear. Traceurs aim to get from one place to another as fast as they can, often in urban areas.

This discipline started in the 1980s with David Belle, who wanted to improve his movement skills. It became popular through movies and videos, showing off impressive tricks and movements. Parkour is all about seeing your surroundings in a new way and moving with efficiency and freedom.
title: Parkour
